text: Maradi Region is one of the seven regions of Niger. The regional capital is Maradi. As of the 2012 census, 3,402,094 people lived there. It has an area of . == Departments == The Maradi Region are divided into 8 departments and one commune: * Aguie Department * Bermo Department * Dakoro Department * Gazaoua Department * Guidan Roumdji Department * Madarounfa Department * Maradi City * Mayahi Department * Tessaoua Department Category:Regions of Niger
title: Maradi Region
